Package io.apptik.rhub

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RHub<P>
    Reactive Hub is a collection of multi-receiver and multi-producer Proxies connecting Publishers and Subscribers so that Subscribers can receive events without knowledge of which Publishers, if any, there are, while maintaining easily identifiable connection between them.
    RHub.ProxyType<R extends Roxy>
    Proxy Type identifies the proxy behaviour.
    RSHub<P extends Publisher>
    Reactive Hub compatible with Reactive Streams Publisher Interface.
    RxJava1Hub
    Reactive Hub compatible with RxJava 1.x Observable
    RxJava2ObsHub
    Reactive Hub compatible with RxJava 2.x Observable
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractReactorHub
    Base Reactor-Core implementation of RSHub
    AbstractRSHub<P extends Publisher>
    Base implementation of RSHub
    AbstractRxJava1Hub
    Base implementation of RxJava1Hub
    AbstractRxJava2ObsHub
    Base implementation of RxJava2ObsHub
    AbstractRxJava2PubHub
    Base RxJava 2.x implementation of RSHub
    DefaultReactorHub
    Default Reactor-Core implementation of RSHub
    DefaultRxJava1Hub
    Default implementation of RxJava1Hub
    DefaultRxJava2ObsHub
    Default implementation of RxJava2ObsHub
    DefaultRxJava2PubHub
    Default RxJava 2.x implementation of RSHub
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RxJava1ProxyType  
    RxJava2ProcProxyType  
    RxJava2SubjProxyType
